name: Heli Attack
description: Penguin Games is proud to drop its latest title Heli Attack for all you chopper fans who like to shoot missiles at stuff. Duel joysticks give you total control over your helicopter and you have an unlimited amount of missiles in this early release of the game.  Fly over various terrains while keeping an eye out for those pesky enemy markers.  You will know what to shoot at when you see it.  Enjoy.
